titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5684) to implement the United States-Oman Free Trade Agreement.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5684) to implement the United States-Oman Free Trade Agreement.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-579, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

During consideration of H.R. 5684 pursuant to this resolution, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postpone further consideration of the bill to a time designated by the Speaker in consonance with section 151 of the Trade Act of 1974.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 216.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 925.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 389).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 187 (Roll no. 390).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5684 (United States-Oman Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act ).
